---
name: Feature Proposal
about: Describe this issue template's purpose here.
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

Just keep the titles. All the rest could be removed.
# Summary
Proposal summary. A brief explanation of what and why this is releavant.

# Justification
Why is this relevant, explain why should this be done.

# Cons / Why not / Not relevant for
What goes agains this proposal?
Can it be ignored? 
Does it have existing alternatives?

# Design Proposal
What is desired design of this feature?
What is the user experience for this feature?

# Implementation
How can it be implemented?
If no idea on how to implement it, feel free to remove this section.

## Option #: Option Summary
What will be done for this option?
How it will be implemented?

### Pros
* List the pros, why this solution is good

### Cons
* List the cons, what is bad on this solution?
* What can be bad?
* What can be negativelly affected /impacted by this solution?

# Other
Feel free to add other sections that could be relevant.
